x<sub>n</sub> - x<sub>1</sub>

 Ta( 2)
        9 - 1 = 8
 Ta( 3)
        255 - 167 = 88 = 11 * 8
 Ta( 4)
        13322 - 2421 = 10901 = 11 * 991
 Ta( 5)
        231518 - 38787 = 192731 = 7 * 11 * 2503
